meanings.sent1: The love between a parent and child is everlasting.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the sky seem to be everlasting.
meanings.sent3: The everlasting sunshine made the beach day even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an everlasting ray of sunshine in his life.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her laughter was an everlasting source of joy for him.

meanings.definition: Continuing indefinitely or for a long period of time.
meanings.sent1: The everlasting rain caused flooding in the area.
meanings.sent2: The project seemed to be an everlasting task.
meanings.sent3: The everlasting traffic made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent4: His patience was like an everlasting well that never ran dry.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves was an everlasting lullaby for the tired sailor.
